If you have a small stone that passes on its own easily, you may not have symptoms at all.",NIDDK,What I need to know about Kidney Stones
How to diagnose What I need to know about Kidney Stones ?,"To diagnose kidney stones, your doctor will do a physical exam and ask about your medical history. The doctor may ask if you have a family history of kidney stones and about your diet, digestive problems, and other health problems. The doctor may perform urine, blood
